items.title: AI-Powered Product Recommendation Engine
items.description: Implement a recommendation system that suggests products to users based on their browsing and purchase history using AI algorithms.
acceptance_criteria: System displays at least 5 relevant product recommendations on the homepage for logged-in users
Recommendations update in real-time based on user interactions
Recommendation accuracy achieves at least 70% relevance score in A/B testing
System supports personalized recommendations for at least 1 million active users
dependencies: User profile and purchase history data availability
AI model training and deployment infrastructure
non_functional: Scalable to handle peak traffic of 10,000 concurrent users

notes: Assumed the requirement focuses on personalized product recommendations using AI; details on algorithms, data privacy, and integration with existing platform were not provided.
